definition: to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement
to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)

sentences.english: The act expressly provides for injunctive relief.
sentences.chinese: 刑事救济规定对受害人进行充分补偿。

sentences.english: The dispersion influence in networks of ultrahigh -speed optical fiber communication is researched in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了光纤通信网中的色散及其补偿方法。

sentences.english: Compensation method was used to eliminate disturbance of coexisting element titanium.
sentences.chinese: 以补偿法消除共存元素钛对钙的测定干扰。

sentences.english: One springback compensation method for car stamping die surface is narrated.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了汽车冲压模具型面反弹补偿的一种方法。

sentences.english: Part of that revenue loss, however, would be recouped through other taxes.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这些税收的部分损失将从别的税种上补偿回来。

sentences.english: Under error control the electrode non-uniform compensated surface was approximated.
sentences.chinese: 在控制误差下，逼近补偿后的非均匀电板曲面。

sentences.english: At this point in time, no compensation is involved.
sentences.chinese: 在此时间点，不涉及任何补偿。

sentences.english: In Chapter Two, theories on compensation are reviewed to form the theoretical foundation of translation of English alliteration into Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 第二章回顾了作为头韵汉译理论基础的翻译补偿理论。

sentences.english: He was repaid for his conscientious anxiety in the character of a spectator.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个旁观者，他那从良心出发的焦虑得到了补偿。

sentences.english: This is the phenomenon of so-called "function compensation"of muscle in hip joint.
sentences.chinese: 即，髋关节肌有所谓“功能补偿”的现象。

sentences.english: How can parents in father-absent homes compensate, if at all?
sentences.chinese: 在父爱缺失的家庭，父母该如何补偿孩子？

sentences.english: Demodulation performance of OFDM systems can be improved after CFO is compensated.
sentences.chinese: 将跟踪到的频偏补偿后，提高了系统解调性能。

sentences.english: By taking a finite-time iteration of the compensation sequence, a suboptimal control law is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 取补偿项序列的有限次迭代值，获得次优控制律。

sentences.english: The cost compensation for quasi-public goods has been the focus of attention in public finance circles.
sentences.chinese: 准公共产品的成本补偿一直是财政界关注的一个问题。

sentences.english: Otherwise, compensations were the thing here.
sentences.chinese: 这些缺点却在另一方面得到了补偿。

sentences.english: That includes setting the compensation of the chief executive.
sentences.chinese: 其中包括设定首席执行官的补偿金。

definition: to compensate/to make good (a financial loss)
restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
